capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that, and I'm certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of vernon before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's lineage and maculogy are quite interesting. I've been studying his medical history, and it seems that his family has a strong connection to this particular condition. I'm fairly certain that the genetic link is what causes these issues with his eyesight.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the character maculogy's age?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's a great guy, and I've always thought he was a bit of an underdog. I mean, being the gamekeeper at Hogwarts isn't exactly the most glamorous job, but he takes it very seriously and is super passionate about magical creatures. And yeah, I'm certain that Hagrid is indeed male - I don't think anyone's ever questioned that!
